body: One small nit before actual review: you're committing a Makefile to the repository.
Doh - dunno how that got in there...should be fixed now.

Before these commits, the getblocktemplate thread was being woken up before joining the thread. I had moved the signal to the end of StopRPCThreads, but I think we could end up with a deadlock if we wait to signal until after joining the thread.
Please either remove these debugging statements or replace them with category-specific LogPrint()
I'll remove all LogPrint() once we've tested.
Nit: Can you make this a 2-liner? Same nit for the change below.
Nit: random should be placed where main was (alphabetical ordering).
Nit: Should be above thread (alphabetical ordering).
Nit: Should be above std (alphabetical ordering).

This should be seen as a minimally-invasive temporary fix, allowing us to use RAII on mutexes whose existence we can only know about at runtime (i.e. pwalletMain->cs_wallet).

The permanent fix will be to move all functionality depending on pwalletMain->cs_wallet into separate functions altogether - or perhaps to encapsulate locking within the wallet class itself.

Concept ACK, I now like the approach you take to pushing down the locks.

(someone will have to verify that all the RPC methods get the right locks, but this is easier to review than functional changes inside the methods)

I checked locking for all RPC calls after your change.

## Non-threadsafe RPC functions

according to the table in https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcserver.cpp :
- `getinfo`: locks cs_main, and cs_wallet if there is a wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmisc.cpp#L74
- `signrawtransaction`: locks cs_main, and cs_wallet if there is a wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcrawtransaction.cpp#L546
- `validateaddress`: locks cs_main, and cs_wallet if there is a wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmisc.cpp#L182
- `getnetworkinfo`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcnet.cpp#L415
- `getconnectioncount`: locks cs_main and cs_vNodes, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcnet.cpp#L36
- `getpeerinfo`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcnet.cpp#L116
- `ping`: locks cs_main and cs_vNodes, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcnet.cpp#L55
- `getblockchaininfo`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L474
- `getbestblockhash`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L115
- `getblockcount`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L98
- `getblock`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L277
- `getblockhash`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L231
- `getchaintips`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L527
- `getdifficulty`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L132
- `getrawmempool`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L169
- `gettxout`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L383
- `gettxoutsetinfo`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L328
- `verifychain`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcblockchain.cpp#L441
- `getblocktemplate`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmining.cpp#L356
- `getmininginfo`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmining.cpp#L238
- `getnetworkhashps`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmining.cpp#L88
- `prioritisetransaction`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmining.cpp#L280
- `getgenerate`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmining.cpp#L108
- `gethashespersec`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmining.cpp#L203
- `createrawtransaction`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcrawtransaction.cpp#L341
- `decoderawtransaction`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcrawtransaction.cpp#L437
- `decodescript`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcrawtransaction.cpp#L477
- `getrawtransaction`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcrawtransaction.cpp#L174
- `sendrawtransaction`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcrawtransaction.cpp#L739
- `verifymessage`: locks cs_main, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcmisc.cpp#L340

## Threadsafe RPC functions:
- `help`: No lock as expected
- `stop`: No lock as expected
- `addnode`: No lock as expected
- `getaddednodeinfo`: No lock as expected
- `getnettotals`: No lock as expected
- `getmempoolinfo`: No lock as expected
- `submitblock`: No lock as expected
- `setgenerate`: No lock as expected
- `createmultisig`: No lock as expected
- `estimatefee`: No lock as expected
- `estimatepriority`: No lock as expected

## Wallet:
- `addmultisigaddress`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L946
- `backupwallet`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1622
- `dumpprivkey`: **Locks missing**, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcdump.cpp#L323
- `dumpwallet`: **Locks missing**, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcdump.cpp#L352
- `encryptwallet`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1835
- `getaccountaddress`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L171
- `getaccount`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L273
- `getaddressesbyaccount`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L305
- `getbalance`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L640
- `getnewaddress`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L95
- `getrawchangeaddress`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L197
- `getreceivedbyaccount`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L548
- `getreceivedbyaddress`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L493
- `gettransaction`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1572
- `getunconfirmedbalance`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L695
- `getwalletinfo`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L2036
- `importprivkey`: **locks missing**, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcdump.cpp#L94
- `importwallet`: **locks missing**, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcdump.cpp#L225
- `importaddress`: **locks missing**, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcdump.cpp#L160
- `keypoolrefill`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1646
- `listaccounts`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1394
- `listaddressgroupings`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L394
- `listlockunspent`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1972
- `listreceivedbyaccount`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1156
- `listreceivedbyaddress`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1123
- `listsinceblock`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1484
- `listtransactions`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1312
- `listunspent`: **Locks missing**, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcrawtransaction.cpp#L237
- `lockunspent`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1901
- `move`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L723
- `sendfrom`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L797
- `sendmany`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L859
- `sendtoaddress`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L344
- `setaccount`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L229
- `settxfee`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L2005
- `signmessage`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L441
- `walletlock`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1792
- `walletpassphrasechange`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1744
- `walletpassphrase`: locks cs_main and cs_wallet, https://github.com/CodeShark/bitcoin/blob/No_main_in_rpcserver/src/rpcwallet.cpp#L1695

Conclusion:
- Locks missing in `dumpprivkey`, `dumpwallet`, `importprivkey`, `importwallet`, `importaddress` (rpcdump.cpp)
- Locks missing in `listunspent` (rpcrawtransaction.cpp)
- All other functions have the necessary locks

Not sure where to move them otherwise (probably a bitcoin-specific RPC server module, where the method registration belongs too) but it's not very nice to have these RPC-specific implementation functions in init.cpp
